channel.title: Which IP do I put in my client? [317]
channel.description: Now before you get on me calling me a leech, I plan to be using this forum much more often after this. I'm not a leech, as it may appear right now. Moving onward :D I cannot get my 317 Delta server to go online for me unless I use 127.0.0.1 Yes, I have port forwarded, and I know how to change the IP. But which IP do I use? The No-Ip name I have set up for my server is: Zyrox.no-ip.org But the IP that it says I have is 67.166.253.188... What should I do? Thanks in advance for anyone who can help me.

item.title: Which IP do I put in my client? [317]
item.dc:creator: @mc_wobbla mc wobbla
item.description:
@mc_wobbla wrote:

go on canyouseeme.org
type in the port you’re using.
scroll down a bit and if its successful then you have portforwarded correctly

Read full topic
item.source: Which IP do I put in my client? [317]

item.title: Which IP do I put in my client? [317]
item.dc:creator: @Truffler Truffler
item.description:
@Truffler wrote:

Vhenom:

Use one of these tutorials to portforward correctly… http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,51.0.html

Thank you very much, I’ll rep.
Could a mod please lock this?

Read full topic

item.title: Which IP do I put in my client? [317]
item.dc:creator: @Truffler Truffler
item.description:
@Truffler wrote:

Vhenom:

If you have portforwaded correctly then use the no-ip one. make sure to run the program first.

Well in that case I have not port forwarded correctly…
When I go to my netgear router page, do I use my static IP or my local one?
EDIT: I mean when I am actually port forwarding, not visiting my router page.

Read full topic

item.title: Which IP do I put in my client? [317]
item.dc:creator: @Truffler Truffler
item.description:
@Truffler wrote:

Now before you get on me calling me a leech, I plan to be using this forum much more often after this. I’m not a leech, as it may appear right now.
Moving onward
I cannot get my 317 Delta server to go online for me unless I use 127.0.0.1
Yes, I have port forwarded, and I know how to change the IP. But which IP do I use?
The No-Ip name I have set up for my server is: Zyrox.no-ip.org
But the IP that it says I have is 67.166.253.188…
What should I do? Thanks in advance for anyone who can help me.
